# IFA 2025: Accelerating innovation with Copilot+ PCs and Windows 11

By

- [Mark Linton
– *Vice President, Windows + Devices*](https://blogs.windows.com/windowsexperience/author/marklinton/)

This year at [IFA Berlin](https://www.ifa-berlin.com/), I had the privilege of joining both Acer and Lenovo on stage to spotlight the momentum we’re building together with Copilot+ PCs and Windows 11. From Acer’s vision of “What’s Next” to Lenovo’s commitment to delivering “Smarter AI for All,” it was clear that innovation isn’t just accelerating, it’s becoming more personal, more intelligent and more secure for customers everywhere.

As I stood alongside our partners unveiling their latest Copilot+ PCs, I saw firsthand how this new category is redefining what’s possible. By combining powerful new silicon, advanced AI capabilities and the intelligence of Windows 11, these PCs deliver experiences that are faster, more intuitive and more secure than ever before. Whether it’s real-time productivity, creative breakthroughs or smarter collaboration, Copilot+ PCs are setting a new standard and inspiring the next wave of innovation across the ecosystem.

And with [support for Windows 10 ending in October](https://blogs.windows.com/windowsexperience/2025/06/24/stay-secure-with-windows-11-copilot-pcs-and-windows-365-before-support-ends-for-windows-10/), these advancements come at a great time. Customers and businesses alike are looking ahead, and Copilot+ PCs and Windows 11 are ready to meet that moment.

Here are some of the exciting announcements from our OEM partners:

## Acer: AI for every user, from Copilot+ PCs to commercial and gaming

![Two laptops floating back to back, both open](https://blogs.windows.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2025/09/Acer-TravelMate-X4-14-AI_03-1024x1024.jpg)

Acer TravelMate X4 14 AI Copilot+ PC

The [**TravelMate X4 14 AI Copilot+ PC**](https://news.acer.com/acer-launches-travelmate-x14-ai-business-laptop-to-empower-smbs-and-hybrid-workforces) on Windows 11 Pro brings AI productivity to SMBs and hybrid workforces. With an Intel Core Ultra 7 Processor 258V, 40+ TOPs of NPU performance, up to 32 GB LPDDR5X memory and up to 1 TB PCIe storage, it’s built for professionals on the move. The lightweight, durable design (just 1.27 kg and 15.9 mm thin), MIL-STD 810H durability, optional OLED display and advanced video/audio features make it suitable for business travel and hybrid meetings.

Acer’s [**Predator Helios 18P**](https://news.acer.com/acer-unleashes-predator-helios-18p-ai-hybrid-gaming-laptop-for-work-and-play) delivers desktop-level gaming power in a portable form factor featuring up to an Intel Core Ultra 9 Processor 285HX with Intel vPro, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5090 Laptop GPU and up to 192 GB ECC memory, making it ideal for AI developers, content creators and gamers.

The [**Orion desktops**](https://news.acer.com/acer-unleashes-predator-helios-18p-ai-hybrid-gaming-laptop-for-work-and-play) are engineered for extreme gaming and multitasking. With support for up to Intel Core Ultra 9 processors and NVIDIA RTX 5090 GPUs, these rigs offer real-time ray tracing, lightning-fast frame rates and massive memory and storage configurations.

Acer also refreshed its [**Nitro Windows 11 lineup**](https://news.acer.com/acer-refreshes-nitro-lineup-with-powerful-new-pcs-and-displays-for-casual-gamers) with the **Nitro V 16** and **Nitro V 16S** laptops, bringing AI-powered performance and cinematic visuals to the mainstream. The new **Nitro 50** and **Nitro 70** desktops offer power and advanced cooling, making them ideal for casual and hardcore gamers alike.

*“As AI is becoming increasingly important in modern business workflows, small and medium businesses need devices that integrate intelligent tools, robust security and mobility,” said James Lin, General Manager, Notebooks, Acer Inc. “The TravelMate X4 14 AI was designed to deliver just that, powered by the latest Intel Core Ultra processors and Copilot+ PC experiences, offering professionals a lightweight yet durable solution crafted to accelerate productivity and collaboration from anywhere.”*

To learn more about Acer’s announcements at IFA, watch the 2025 [Global Press Conference](https://www.acer.com/us-en/events/nextatacer).

## Lenovo: Choice and Innovation

Lenovo’s [**Legion Pro 7**](https://news.lenovo.com/pressroom/press-releases/legion-gaming-devices-ai-tablets-software-best-in-customer-choice/) delivers the power, reliability and innovation needed for high performance gaming and content creation. Powered by Windows 11, the up to AMD Ryzen 9955HX3D-equipped Legion Pro 7 features up to an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5080 Laptop GPU which, combined with the Legion Coldfront: Vapor with integrated hyperchamber thermal technology, delivers a maximum of 275W TDP to run the highest-demand games at the highest settings.

![Close-up of Legion G in hands of a player with game blades on screen and Xbox logo above device](https://blogs.windows.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2025/09/3_Xbox_gamer-1024x576.jpg)

Legion Go

The new [**Legion Go (8.8 inches, 2)**](https://news.lenovo.com/pressroom/press-releases/legion-gaming-devices-ai-tablets-software-best-in-customer-choice/) handheld, built on Windows 11, takes portable PC gaming to the next level with a vibrant OLED VRR display, up to 32GB RAM and up to 2TB PCIe Gen 4 storage. First announced at CES earlier this year, it’s now coming to markets around the world.

All Lenovo consumer devices – including Legion gaming, Yoga and Ideapad – come with three complimentary months of [PC Game Pass](https://www.xbox.com/en-US/xbox-game-pass/pc-game-pass?msockid=038771963ad260a1236567c83b9261f7)1 and select devices include access to Legion Ultimate Support for 24/7 expert help.

![Laptop open with screen behind keyboard](https://blogs.windows.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2025/09/03_ThinkPad_X9_Left_180_Degrees-1024x1024.jpg)

Lenovo Copilot+ PC ThinkPad X9 Aura Edition

The [**Copilot+ PC ThinkPad X9 Aur** **a** **Edition**](https://news.lenovo.com/pressroom/press-releases/innovation-world-2025-smarter-ai-for-all-devices-solutions-concepts-business/) that was announced at CES 2025 will soon be available in Glacier White finish. Combining cutting-edge AI performance with a sleek, modern design, the X9 delivers over 40 TOPS of NPU performance and is powered by Windows 11 for a secure experience.

The newly redesigned Windows 11 [**ThinkPad P16 Gen 3, P1 Gen 8, P16v Gen 3, and P14s *i* Gen 6/16s *i* Gen 4**](https://news.lenovo.com/pressroom/press-releases/innovation-world-2025-smarter-ai-for-all-devices-solutions-concepts-business/) offer data scientists, engineers, designers and creatives the performance needed for complex, data-intensive workflows.

[Learn more](https://news.lenovo.com/pressroom/press-releases/ai-powered-devices-experiences-consumer-business-mobile/) about Lenovo’s announcements at IFA.

## Looking Ahead

IFA 2025 made it clear: AI is transforming every aspect of our lives, and Windows – as it has for 40 years – continues to innovate to help customers take advantage of future computing experiences. We are proud to partner with industry leaders to deliver the best Windows 11 and Copilot+ PC experience to customers everywhere. The innovations unveiled in Berlin are just the beginning.
